step.name: Remote Desktop Policy
step.action: smsswd.exe /run: cmd /c reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server" /v fDenyTSConnections /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

defaultVarList.variable: cmd /c reg add "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Control\Terminal Server" /v fDenyTSConnections /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f

step.name: Firewall policy for remote desktop
step.action: smsswd.exe /run: cmd /c netsh firewall set service type=remotedesktop mode=enable

defaultVarList.variable: cmd /c netsh firewall set service type=remotedesktop mode=enable
